title: Initial Release - Early Access
description: Our first public release! Clickfluencer Idle arrives with core gameplay systems, multiple generators, and responsive UI design to kickstart your influencer empire.
changes: Launch of Clickfluencer Idle
Core clicking mechanics with satisfying feedback
6 content generators (Social Media Manager, Content Creator, etc.)
Multiple permanent upgrades to boost production
9 unlockable themes with unique visual styles
Prestige system for long-term progression
Offline earnings - keep growing while away
Local save system with export/import functionality
Fully responsive design for desktop and mobile
No login required - purely browser-based gameplay

title: UI & Gameplay Upgrades
description: Our first minor patch! In this patch, we focused on improving the user interface and adding new gameplay upgrades to enhance your experience.
changes: Added Prestige display to the currency bar at all levels, showing at the start of the bar in both desktop and mobile views
Added dismiss (X) button to event toasts — can be closed visually without interrupting the running event
Upgrades now merge automatically (like theme merges) so new upgrades appear without requiring data resets
Adjusted upgrade costs for better progression balance
Lucky Charm cost scaling changed from ×10 to ×15 per tier for smoother pacing
Overnight Success cost scaling increased to ×5, starting at 25,000 creds
Cred Cache scaling increased to ×5 per tier, up to 31,250,000 for tier 6
Infinite upgrades (AI Enhancements, Better Filters) now appear at the top of the shop list
Removed Light theme's bonus multiplier and updated its description to reflect neutral balance
Quick Stats simplified — now only shows Total Clicks and Score; Prestige level moved to currency bar
Version updated to v0.2.0 Early Access for live branch claude/ui-upgrades-and-fixes-011CUiaKNaUaZCiPk3amDLrU
Build verified successfully with no errors or data resets

title: v0.2.0 — Start Page, Layout Overhaul, Achievements, and Notoriety Stores
description: Major update introducing a new unified layout, achievements system, and revamped upgrade stores to enhance gameplay and user experience.
changes: Implemented new unified layout with desktop sidebar and mobile slide-up bottom nav
Achievements tab added next to Themes with placeholder trophies (per save slot)
Split Upgrades tab into Cred Store and Notoriety Store sections
Applied monospace fonts to all stat and currency values
Introduced theme support for custom fonts, background, and icon images
Added Buy Me a Coffee donation link in Settings
Prestige threshold lowered to 1e7, preserving Themes, Infinite upgrades, and Achievements
Random events rebalanced to occur roughly every 10 minutes
Improved ×10 purchase feedback and disabled state

title: v0.2.1 — Polish, Presentation, and Prestige Prep
description: This patch focuses on presentation, UX clarity, and improving the first impression for both new and returning players. With a brand-new hero splash, marquee news bar, and deeper page structure, Clickfluencer Idle now feels more like a living web app than ever. Creds logic also received a crucial update—your displayed rate now accurately reflects notoriety upkeep costs, helping you make smarter economic decisions on your influencer journey.
changes: Added a live marquee news bar under the navigation with pause-on-hover behavior and clickable links to individual news posts
Overhauled the News system — now presented as a chronological stream with dedicated detail pages for each version
Added unique slugs for news entries and structured changelogs with titles, dates, and developer notes for easier browsing
Revised the Guide and About pages with expanded sections, cleaner formatting, and improved flow between key content areas
Introduced a themed "splash" hero section on the home page, complete with guide and update call-to-action buttons and a smooth scroll-to-game transition
Adjusted core economy display — the Creds +X.Y/s indicator now reflects notoriety upkeep, showing your true net gain per second
Improved page structure consistency and alignment across all routes (Home, Guide, About, News)
Minor polish to font rendering and color transitions for better legibility across themes
Set groundwork for future expansion systems and prestige reworks coming in v0.3.0

title: v0.2.2 — ThemeVV and Prestige Fix
description: A quick fix addressing a minor issue with the ThemeVV identifier to ensure proper functionality and consistency within the game. Further updates to ensure prestige system resets currency correctly.
changes: Corrected the ThemeVV theme ID from 'themeVV' to 'themevv' to maintain consistency with naming conventions and ensure proper theme application
Fixed an issue where prestige resets were not correctly resetting the player's currency, ensuring a proper restart of the economic progression upon prestiging
Infinite upgrades are no longer finite.

title: v0.2.3 — Save Editor & Schema Migration
description: This patch introduces a powerful Save Editor tool for advanced users and implements an important save-file schema migration for improved naming consistency. The editor allows manual customization of all game values, while the migration system ensures backward compatibility with older saves.
changes: Added full Save Editor page with import/export and manual customization
Migrated save-file keys: followers→creds, shards→awards, reputation→prestige
Automatic save-migration for backward compatibility
Save Editor now theme-compatible (warning box remains red regardless of theme)

title: v0.2.4 — Infinite Upgrade Fix, Prestige UI Improvements, and Layout Polish
description: This patch addresses a critical issue preventing players from progressing their infinite upgrades, introduces a clearer Prestige progress indicator, and applies several UI refinements for a smoother and more readable experience.
changes: Fixed a major bug preventing players from purchasing additional levels of infinite upgrades (AI Enhancements, Better Filters) due to incorrect `purchased` save-state behavior
Added new 'Next Prestige' banner that displays the required Creds for your next prestige milestone when prestige is not yet available
Improved banner spacing and layout with additional bottom padding to create clearer separation between UI sections
Improved formatting of large numbers in the prestige cost display for easier readability across themes
Added internal safeguards to prevent corrupted upgrades from blocking progression in imported save files

title: v0.3.0 — Premium Design & UX Overhaul
description: Major visual redesign transforming Clickfluencer Idle into a polished, commercial-quality idle game. This update introduces a comprehensive design system, enhanced typography, premium component styling, and improved visual hierarchy across every screen. The game now feels like a top-chart idle experience with cohesive theming, smoother animations, and professional polish throughout.
changes: Comprehensive Design System — Implemented professional typography scale with 7 heading levels and consistent font sizing
Premium Shadow System — Added game-card shadows, accent glows, and elevation levels for depth and polish
Enhanced Button Styles — New btn-primary and btn-secondary classes with micro-interactions, hover lifts, and press states
Premium Click Button — Redesigned main Post button with animated glow effect, gradient backgrounds, and shine-on-hover
Card Component Overhaul — All Generator, Upgrade, and Theme cards now use card-premium styling with better hover states
Hero Section Redesign — New animated mesh gradient background with staggered entrance animations and improved CTAs
Typography Improvements — Added gradient text for headings, stat-value and stat-label utilities for consistent number displays
Theme-Aware Gradients — All new gradients use CSS variables and rgb(from var()) for perfect theme compatibility across all 10 themes
Enhanced AdSlot Component — Future-proof ad placeholder with theme-aware styling and tasteful development indicators
About & Guide Pages Polish — Redesigned information pages with card-premium layouts and improved readability
Improved Floating Numbers — Better text shadows and drop-shadow effects for click feedback visibility
New Animation System — Added shimmer and glow keyframes for premium visual effects
Gradient Mesh Backgrounds — New bg-gradient-mesh and bg-gradient-radial utilities for hero sections
Badge System Refresh — Updated badge styles with better padding and font weights
Performance Preserved — All visual enhancements maintain existing React.memo optimizations and CSS containment
Accessibility Maintained — Focus states, ARIA labels, and reduced-motion preferences fully supported in new design system
Mobile Optimizations — Responsive typography and touch-friendly button sizes across all screen sizes
Consistent Border Radius — Unified rounded-xl and rounded-2xl usage across all interactive elements

title: v0.3.1 — Phase 1: Economy Tools + Ultra Polish + Showcase
description: Major development update introducing professional economy balancing tools, enhanced UI polish with sophisticated gradients and animations, and a stunning marketing showcase page. This update also refines ad slot support across the entire application and delivers the highest level of visual quality to date.
changes: Economy Balancer DevTool — New interactive simulation tool at /devtools/economy with real-time charts, parameter editing, and save/load profiles
Live Economy Simulation — Visualize production, prestige gains, and cost curves over configurable time periods with interactive charts
Parameter Testing — Edit generator multipliers, cost scaling, upgrade values, and prestige thresholds in real-time
Preset Configurations — Quick-load balanced, fast, and slow economy configurations for rapid testing
Chart Visualizations — Production graphs, total creds accumulation, prestige point tracking, generator costs, and upgrade comparisons using Recharts
Ultra UI Polish Pass — Added sophisticated gradient overlays (bg-gradient-sophisticated), premium glow effects, and pulse animations
Enhanced Animation System — New shimmer, glow, and pulse-glow keyframes with theme-aware styling
Smooth Transitions — Added cubic-bezier easing functions (transition-smooth, transition-bounce) for premium feel
Marketing Showcase Page — Professional game studio landing page at /showcase with hero section, features, screenshots, and testimonials
SEO Optimization — Comprehensive metadata, Open Graph tags, and Twitter Card support for the showcase page
Changelog Integration — Dynamic latest update section on showcase page pulling from changelog data
Enhanced Ad Support — Added strategic ad slot placements throughout the app (desktop sidebar, mobile tabs, showcase page)
Multiple Ad Formats — Leaderboard, rectangle, and vertical ad slot positions with theme-aware placeholder styling
Corrected Hero Badge — Removed 'No Ads' messaging to reflect future monetization plans while maintaining privacy-first approach
Gradient Enhancements — New bg-gradient-sophisticated with multi-layer radial gradients for premium visual depth
Glow Effects — Added .glow and .glow-strong utility classes with animated pulsing for important UI elements
Performance Optimized — All new animations respect prefers-reduced-motion and use GPU-accelerated properties
Theme Compatibility — All new gradients, glows, and effects adapt perfectly to all 10 theme variants
Testimonials Section — Player review cards with 5-star ratings and authentic feedback on showcase page
Feature Grid — Six key features highlighted with icons, titles, and descriptions on showcase page
Screenshot Placeholders — Attractive placeholders for game screens with thematic icons and descriptions
Final CTA Section — Compelling call-to-action with gradient background and prominent play button
Developer Tools — Economy balancer positioned for future expansion with additional dev utilities
Chart Theme Integration — Recharts styled with CSS variables for perfect theme compatibility
Mobile Responsive — All new pages and features fully responsive across all device sizes

title: v0.3.2 — Phase 3: Live-Ops Framework, Dev Console & Offline Overhaul
description: Comprehensive Phase 3 update introducing live-ops event foundations, in-game developer console, enhanced offline progress with detailed summaries, local analytics tracking, and extensive UI/UX refinements including unified backgrounds and reduced button glows for a more premium, polished experience.
changes: Live-Ops Event Framework — Complete event system infrastructure with event types, rewards, conditions, and automatic scheduling
Event UI Components — EventBanner and EventsPanel components with auto-hide when no active events
Event Utilities — Helper functions for active/upcoming events, multiplier calculations, and time formatting
Developer Console — In-game dev tools panel (dev mode only) with state inspector and command execution
Dev Commands — Add resources, unlock achievements, simulate ticks, reset FTUE, and manage offline timers
State Inspector — Real-time view of resources, generators, upgrades, achievements, settings, and debug info
Announcements Page — Dedicated /announcements route with priority sorting and visual cards distinct from patch notes
Enhanced Offline Progress — Detailed summary modal showing time away, creds gained, awards gained, top generators, and achievements unlocked offline
Offline Achievement Support — Track and display achievements unlocked during offline periods
Local Analytics Layer — Privacy-first analytics tracking sessions, clicks, upgrades, prestige, and page visits (no network calls)
Analytics Storage — Efficient localStorage-based analytics with session management and interaction heatmaps
Background Gradient Unification — Eliminated hard seams between sections with unified fixed-attachment gradient system
Refined Button Glows — Reduced glow intensity (12-16px radius, 0.25-0.35 opacity) for cleaner, more premium appearance
Ad Integration Cleanup — Removed all placeholder ad containers and dashed rectangles, added Google AdSense auto-ads script
Seamless Section Transitions — Made page sections transparent to work with unified background gradient
Save State Migration — Added v0.3.2 migration support ensuring all previous saves load without errors
Backward Compatibility — Auto-upgrade missing fields while preserving all user progress from older versions
QOL Polish Foundations — Scaffolding for tooltip enhancements, history logs, and audio system
Enhanced Modal Animations — Staggered entrance animations for offline progress breakdown cards
Top Generator Tracking — Display which generators contributed most during offline periods
Session Analytics — Track session length, clicks per minute, upgrade choices, and FTUE drop-off points
Dev Console Shortcuts — Quick access to common development tasks via keyboard-friendly command panel
Event Multiplier System — Support for production, award, prestige, and cost multipliers from active events
Announcement Priority System — Important announcements highlighted with visual badges and accent borders
Fixed Gradient Backgrounds — Prevent gradient cut-off on tall screens with proper attachment and sizing
Theme Compatibility — All Phase 3 features fully compatible with all 10 theme variants
Performance Maintained — No regression in game tick rate or UI responsiveness with new features
Mobile Optimized — Dev console, announcements, and offline modal fully responsive on all devices

title: v0.3.3 — Phase 3B: Polish & Hotfix Pass
description: Comprehensive polish update addressing visual consistency, navigation improvements, and UI refinements across achievements, sharing, and theming systems. This update focuses on removing all remaining visual seams, improving the achievement display, enhancing share card functionality, and streamlining navigation.
changes: Polished all theme backgrounds to remove visible seams between sections with improved unified gradient system
Enhanced unified gradient with smoother transitions and better coverage on mobile and ultra-wide screens
Removed solid backgrounds from Footer and GameShell to ensure seamless gradient flow
Updated navigation: added Announcements link, removed Guide from top nav, moved Acknowledgements to footer only
Complete overhaul of Achievement UI with 2-column desktop layout (3 columns on ultra-wide >1600px)
Achievement cards now show requirement text for all non-secret achievements with improved readability
Implemented cleaner achievement card spacing with reduced padding and larger icons (text-5xl)
Completed achievements display soft green glow effect for visual distinction
Secret achievements show grayscale silhouette effect with 30% opacity until unlocked
Tier badges repositioned to prevent overlap with achievement icons
Improved Share Card with theme-based gradient backgrounds using active theme accent colors
Share Card now displays 3 metrics: Score, Prestige, and Total Achievements Unlocked
Enhanced Share Card typography with larger title, better spacing, and social share tile aesthetic
Share image export layout improved with centered metrics and emoji consistency across platforms
Reduced hero section overlay intensity for more subtle visual transitions
Ad placeholder removal confirmed complete (completed in v0.3.2)
Improved visual consistency across all 10 themes with reduced button glow intensity
All changes tested and verified across mobile, tablet, and ultra-wide viewports

title: v0.4.0 — Option C: Game Dashboard Layout Transformation
description: Complete layout redesign implementing the Option C Game Dashboard style. This major update transforms the UI into a proper two-column game dashboard on desktop with the POST button prominently positioned in the primary action zone, while mobile receives a game-first layout with the POST button appearing before navigation tabs.
changes: Full layout redesign to Option C Game Dashboard style
Massive UI overhaul with improved mobile gameplay
Continuous background gradients across all themes
New Announcements page added to main navigation
Complete achievements redesign with visible requirements
POST button relocated to primary action zone
Currency HUD condensed into a single-line module
Share Card updated with theme-based gradient and new metrics
Improved code structure and reduced heavy glow/shadow usage
Performance and accessibility improvements
